title: Worlds of IF (September/October 1974) (Modified)
description: Note: The serial "A Knight of Ghosts and Shadows" by Poul Anderson has been removed at the request of the estate of Poul Anderson. The writings of Lester Del Rey have been removed due to a request by John Betancourt of Wildside Press. (Contents information excerpted from The Internet Speculative Fiction Database ) Art: A Knight of Ghosts and Shadows (Part 1 of 2) by uncredited Torchships Now! (If, September-October 1974) by Freff Ars Gratia (If, September-October 1974) by Edward Kimmel Mephisto and the Ion Explorer by Stephen Fabian Such Is Fate by uncredited Julie by uncredited Death and Taxes by uncredited Egantei and the Sage by Freff Saying Goodbye by Freff Essays: Torchships Now! (If, September-October 1974) by Robert D. Enzmann On Building Walls by Jim Baen Reading Room (If, September-October 1974) by Lester del Rey The Alien Viewpoint (If, September-October 1974) by Richard E. Geis Hue and Cry (If, September-October 1974) by uncredited Letter (If, September-October 1974) by Joan Spicci Saberhagen Letter (If, September-October 1974) by Richard E. Geis Sf Calendar (If, September-October 1974) by uncredited Novelette: Mephisto and the Ion Explorer by Colin Kapp Serial: A Knight of Ghosts and Shadows (Part 1 of 2) by Poul Anderson Short Stories: Such Is Fate by Arsen Darnay Julie by Jan Trenholm Egantei and the Sage by John C. White Saying Goodbye by Scott Edelstein Shortfiction: Death and Taxes by S. Roger Keith
